original_text: And whoever will not listen to my words that he shall speak in my name, I myself will require it of him.
korean_text: 누구든지 내 이름으로 전하는 내 말을 듣지 아니하는 자는 내게 벌을 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And whoever will not listen to my words
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 말을 듣지 아니하는 자는 누구든지

sentences.original_text: that he shall speak in my name
I myself will require it of him
